Updated November     pm





Staff Writer

K.J.Bohaniup.edu

K.J.Bohaniup.edu

Lexie Palluconi senior fashion merchandising scored two of the teams three goals in IUPs shutout victory over California University of Pennsylvania on Wednesday night PERIOD

Last week was an upanddown week for the Crimson Hawks as the IUP soccer team went  in conference play losing to Clarion University and beating rival California University of Pennsylvania PERIOD

The match against Clarion saw two strong defensive teams take the field in a  victory for the Golden Eagles PERIOD

Clarion scored what ended up as the gamedeciding goal in the first minute of the game PERIOD

It was the fourth goal that freshman goalkeeper Makenzie Witzel undecided had given up all year PERIOD

Throughout the game IUP had several chances to even the score PERIOD

The Crimson Hawks totaled  shots and seven corner kicks PERIOD

They also outshot the Golden Eagles by five total shots and had the same amount of shots on goal in the game PERIOD

The game proved to be a physical matchup as the teams combined to have  total fouls on the evening PERIOD

Wednesdays game against Cal U saw IUP rebound after the loss earlier in the week PERIOD The Crimson Hawks unleashed a barrage of goals throughout the course of the first half and beat the Vulcans  PERIOD

Senior forward Lexie Palluconi fashion merchandising tallied two total goals for the evening both coming from one on one drives down the field to get passed the Cal Us keeper PERIOD

The scoring was however started by midfielder Megan Coyne senior kinesiology who scored her goal on a free kick in the nineteenth minute of the game PERIOD

Overall the Crimson Hawks completely dominated the entire game PERIOD

IUP boasted an impressive  shots to Cal Us two shots PERIOD

Fifteen of IUPs shots were also on goal PERIOD

Defense played a strong part in the contest as only one shot from Cal U made it to freshman goalkeeper Madeline Smakulski undecided who posted her fourth shutout of the year PERIOD

Along with strong scoring Brandie Bryant senior kinesiologynotched two assists on the day as well PERIOD

After the game coach Adel Heder showed optimism for its goal to make advances into the postseason PERIOD

He talked about how the team showed great promise and despite being very young still had high hopes to advance further into the Pennsylvania State Athletic Conference PSAC postseason PERIOD

The upcoming schedule will determine a lot for how IUP will finish the season as PSAC play begins to heat up PERIOD

The next two Saturdays will show the Crimson Hawks taking on Millersville University and then Mansfield University on Oct PERIOD  PERIOD Both games will begin at  p.m PERIOD
